about_the_game:
Journey through Rafta with the Potionomics artbook as your guide! This visual feast of 128 pages contains:

  • Early character concept art and design progression

  • A gallery of gorgeous card artwork

  • All your favorite potions and early drafts of ingredients

  • Bonus illustrations that provide a deeper insight into the isle of Rafta


How to access the artbook:

1. Install Potionomics

2. Right-click Potionomics in your Steam Library and go to “Properties”

3. In the Properties window, go to “DLC” and confirm that “Potionomics - Artbook” is installed

4. In the Properties window, go to “Installed Files” and click “Browse...”

5. A file explorer will open with the “Potionomics_Artbook.pdf” file in it!
